deliverable: Fully working solution (builds and runs without manual fixes)

instructions.note: This JSON is only for reading the requirements. Do NOT use JSON as a storage/format inside the app implementation unless explicitly required later.

core.goal: Plot user-entered mathematical functions and allow zooming and panning.

input.functionExpression: User types a function of x (e.g., sin(x), x^2, 2*x+1).

uiFeatures: Inputs for X range (from/to) and sampling resolution
Pan controls (mouse drag) to change graph position
Axes (X/Y) and grid lines with numeric labels

implementationNotes.expressionParsing: Implement or use a lightweight expression parser (no JSON usage). Validate input and show friendly errors.
implementationNotes.rendering: Draw using GDI+ (Graphics) on a Panel/PictureBox; keep axes/grid static relative to world coordinates.
implementationNotes.performance: Re-render efficiently when zoom/pan changes; keep UI responsive.
implementationNotes.accuracy: Handle discontinuities (e.g., tan) by breaking lines where needed.
implementationNotes.usability: Show current scale/zoom level and center coordinates (optional).
